qrLoginCenter.title: QR Login Center
qrLoginCenter.pageInfo: You can log in by recognizing the QR code from Smart Glasses.
qrLoginCenter.LoginInfo: You can only use QR Login with the compatible devices.
centerHowTo: Please launch the VIRNECT app on your smart glass.
Select [QR Login] on the login screen to run it.
Please hold over the QR code displayed on the QR Login Center screen.
You will be logged in when the QR code is scanned.
loginHowTo: Please launch a VIRNECT product or service.
Select [Go to QR Login Center] icon
Please hold over the QR code displayed on the QR Login Center screen.
You will be logged in when the QR code is scanned.
